name: ClickDesigns
author: ClickDesigns

sections.description:
The number one design software for marketers and entrepreneurs who want to create incredible graphics and designs in minutes for their websites, blogs and sales funnels in minutes.

You can create stunning logos, boxshots, covers, reports, digital mockups, product bundles, graphics & illustrations for your webpages, videos, socials, emails & banners without expensive software, freelancers or graphic designers.

It’s perfect for newbies, digital marketers, entrepreneurs, influencers, social media marketers, bloggers, authors & publishers, ecommerce, software creators, freelancers & many others.

Works with the most popular site builders, funnel building and blogging platforms.

  1. WordPress default editor Gutenberg
  2. WordPress Classic Editor
  3. Elementor
  4. Themify
  5. WooCommerce
  6. Visual Composer
  7. WP Bakery
  8. Beaver Builder
  9. Divi
  10. Oxygen Builder
  11. Thrive Architect Page Builder

Please watch this video tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Cu77FkiD8z4
sections.changelog:
1.8.0 – 2024-07-09

  • Bugs fixed on latest WordPress version (6.5.5)

1.7.0 – 2023-11-21

  • Thumbnail Improvements in WordPress media library

1.6.0 – 2023-04-28

  • Thrive Architect Page Builder Plugin Support

1.5.0 – 2022-12-19

  • Minor Bugs Fixed

1.4.0 – 2022-12-09

  • Minor Bugs Fixed

1.3.0 – 2022-12-09

  • Edit Design Option Added

1.2.0 – 2022-11-02

  • Agency Filter Added

1.1.0 – 2022-10-31

  • Minor Bugs Fixed

1.0.0 – 2022-10-21

  • Initial Public Release
